prompt: Approximate a 90-degree pipe elbow using simple primitives: create two cylinders (radius 15 mm, depth 80 mm) intersecting at right angles with their ends overlapping by ~20 mm (ADD) to form an elbow-like shape. Then hollow it by cutting a coaxial inner cylinder (radius 12 mm) THROUGH_ALL for each branch. Use explicit units and validate with onshape_snapshot_partstudio.
